semantics.label: Solution
semantics.description: Enter the desired solution for the lock. Please note that using long solutions may be suboptimal on small devices.

semantics.label: Symbols for each segment
semantics.description: Choose the symbols that each segment should bear. The symbols will appear in the order defined here.

fields.label: AutoCheck
fields.description: If autocheck is enabled, the lock will open automatically once the correct solution has been entered.

fields.label: Maximum attempts
fields.description: Enter the maximum number of opening attempts allowed or leave empty to not limit the number.

fields.label: Attempts left
fields.description: @number is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective number of attempts left.

fields.label: Wrong combination
fields.default: This combination does not open the lock.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check whether the combination opens the lock.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The correct symbols that will open the lock will be displayed.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all lock segments and start the task over again.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for current symbol
fields.description: @symbol is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective value.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for current symbols
fields.description: @symbols is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective value.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for previous symbol button
Assistive technology description for next symbol button
Assistive technology description for announcing correct combination
fields.description: @combination is a placeholder and will be replaced by the respective value.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for announcing a wrong combination
Assistive technology description for announcing "combination lock"
Assistive technology description for announcing the current segment
fields.description: @number and @total are placeholders and will be replaced by the respective values.
